52.eng-name: Characteristics of the Day of Judgment, Paradise, and Hell

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:The Similitude of a believer is that of (a standing) crop which the air continues to toss from one side to another; in the same way a believer always (receives the strokes) of misfortune. The similitude of a hypocrite is that of a cypress tree which does not move until it is uprooted

chapter.ara-name: باب مَثَلُ الْمُؤْمِنِ كَالزَّرْعِ وَمَثَلُ الْكَافِرِ كَشَجَرِ الأَرْزِ
chapter.eng-name: The Believer Is Like A Plant And The Hypocrite And The Disbeliever Are Like Cedars
